Module 1: MeL Overview

Overview of Resources

Types of Resources

The types of MeL resources you will visit are these three resources:

  • eBook K-8 Collection
  • PebbleGo (K-2)
  • Primary Search (3-6)

In this course, you will focus on specific eResources that support Elementary Career awareness.

Explore the world of endless career possibilities with the help of digital eResources. From traditional to nontraditional careers, these resources provide a wide variety of content for young minds and will help students discover career options they never knew existed, including those related to military service. With the guidance of counselors and educators, young learners can begin to uncover their true passions.

Get ready to be inspired!
